mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Peter Frozier Epperly, Until he reached 21 years of age 04.17.1899
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Peter Frozier Epperly, Until he reached 21 years of age 04.17.1899 Guardianship of J. Franklin, David Letcher, Noah, and Posie Epperly (J.Franklin was 21 on 01.17.1900) (David Letcher was 21 on 03.30.1901) (Noah was 21 08.30.1903) (Posie was 21 05.17.1905) A.W. Lester, Guardian Recorded in the Settlement Book, page 268, of the Floyd County Circuit Court
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
